title: The Emerald Empress Haaram: A Diamond and Pearl Masterpiece
materials: meticulously adorned with brilliant-cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
G Color). Showcasing Emerald gemstones and lustrous South Sea Pearls. Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for enduring shine.
features: This exquisite haaram features an intricate floral design, set with sparkling diamonds. A central Emerald adds a regal touch, complemented by the cascading South Sea Pearls. The pendant design is inspired by traditional motifs, showcasing fine craftsmanship.
colors: with a striking emerald green accent and the soft ivory of the pearls. The classic combination exudes elegance and sophistication.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Ideal for a bride's muhurtham
or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Suitable for formal events and special gatherings.
description: This haaram embodies the timeless elegance of South Indian jewelry. The high-quality diamonds and lustrous pearls create a piece of unparalleled beauty. Its design seamlessly blends traditional aesthetics with modern sensibilities. A valuable heirloom to be cherished for generations.
